subject.name: Tiếng Anh
subject.description: Chương trình Tiếng Anh lớp 7 năm 2025

chapters.name: My House and My School
chapters.description: Vocabulary and grammar around house, school and daily routines

sections.name: Vocabulary: Rooms and Furniture
sections.description: Basic words for rooms, furniture and school places

lessons.title: Rooms in the house
lessons.content: Vocabulary: living room, bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, garden, balcony, etc. Simple sentences describing your house.

lessons.title: Places at school
lessons.content: Vocabulary: classroom, library, playground, canteen, laboratory, etc. Practice with "There is / There are".

sections.name: Grammar: Present Simple
sections.description: Present Simple for daily routines and habits

lessons.title: Present Simple: form and use
lessons.content: Affirmative, negative and question forms of Present Simple. Adverbs of frequency (always, usually, often, sometimes, never).

chapters.name: Health and Hobbies
chapters.description: Talking about health problems and free-time activities

lessons.title: Health problems and advice
lessons.content: Vocabulary: headache, stomachache, toothache, fever, flu, etc. Using "should / shouldn't" to give advice.

sections.name: Speaking: Hobbies and free time
sections.description: Talking about hobbies and free-time activities

lessons.title: Talking about hobbies
lessons.content: Expressions: "I like / love / enjoy", "I am interested in", "My favourite hobby is ...". Simple dialogue examples.
